title: Draft a Purchase Offer
description: A buyer client is ready to make an offer on a property. The agent must draft the residential purchase agreement.

tasks.description: Gather all offer details from the buyer: price, financing terms, contingencies (inspection, appraisal), and desired closing date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly collects all necessary terms for the offer.

tasks.description: Populate the standard residential purchase agreement form with the property and offer details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a correctly filled-out purchase agreement.

tasks.description: Send the drafted offer to the buyer for their electronic signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the document for signature using a tool like DocuSign.
